provideInstructions.description: Use this element to indicate whether or not to provide the instructions.

options.description: Indicates the format options. SUPPRESS_ADDITIONAL_LANGUAGES value will suppress English language if another language is specified in the language code field.

optionsRequested.description: Indicate the requested options for document format.

stockType.description:
Specify the label stock type.
click here to see label format types

dispositions.description: Details on creating, organizing, and returning the document.

eMailRecipients.description: Indicates the shipping document email recipients.

emailAddress.description:
Specifies the email address.
Example: email@fedex.com

recipientType.description: Specify the email notification recipient type.

locale.description:
These are locale details.
Example: 'en_US'
click here to see locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

grouping.description: Identifies the convention by which documents are to be grouped as email attachment.

eMailDetail.description: Specifies how to e-mail shipping documents.

dispositionType.description: Specify how to create and return the document.

items.description: These are document diposition details. Each occurrence of this class specifies a particular way in which a kind of shipping document is to be produced and provided.

locale.description:
These are locale details.
example: 'en_US'
click here to see Locales
Note: If the locale is left blank or an invalid locale is entered, an error message is returned in response.

docType.description:
Specify the image format used for shipping document.
click here to see label format types

description: These are characteristics of a shipping document to be produced.
